title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 139.1 - Service at single location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 139.1 - Service at single location

State Regulations

Except when multiple meters are provided at the request of
a customer, or when provided under the conditions or circumstances set forth in
sections
139.3, 139.4 and
139.6
of this Part, all service to
a customer at a single location shall be rendered through a single
meter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
139.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
